verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Wounded for me, wounded for me There on the cross He was wounded for me Gone my transgressions, and now I am free All because Jesus was wounded for me. Dying for me, dying for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There on the cross He was dying for me Now in His death my redemption I see All because Jesus was dying for me. Risen for me, risen for me Up from the grave He has risen for me{/lang-eng}
